Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Dennis Eckersley (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/3/1985, off Larry Andersen (PHI)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 8/31/1985...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,157,143 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/15/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $2,420,420 per year...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Traded from Texas to Los Angeles on 8/1/1988 (Going to TEX: 3B Craig Grebeck, P Tim Scott. Going to LAD: SS Greg Gagne, 2B Johnny Ray)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1988...
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/23/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
